name: Tengoku
description:
Play as a fallen ghost to fight for your way back to Heaven as monsters and enemies try to kick you lower. Kill enemies, collect their souls for heightened abilities  for your chance back to heaven.

Use ghostly powers to teleport and to fly around the map, collecting souls, ghostly fragments, and weapons to aid your journey!

How to play:

Use A and D to move 

Space to jump

F to interact (pick up weapons and proceed to next level)

Shift to attack

E to teleport

Ctrl + space to 'soul jump'

Arrow keys to aim and move camera

[Adding sound broke the game last minute so no sound for now, maybe if I work on it more it'll be back with better and more levels, enemies and weapons]
